entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow and rain showers ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Thursday 28 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 2.
